30.heading: Captain Easy.
30.title: Wash Tubbs
30.author: by Crane.
notes: Caption title.

Scrapbooks of daily comic strips dated from October 5, 1939 to February 16, 1942, and from November 26, 1945 to March 1, 1969. Beginning with the 1945 volume the strips are signed "Leslie Turner," and on September 19, 1949 the caption title changes to Captain Easy. 1. Adventure story comics. I. Crane, Roy. II. Turner, Leslie. III. Captain Easy. Call no.: PN6728.W37F6 1939
